column1: User Centric Policy Management for Social Networks
column4: User Centric Policy Management for Social Networks

The goal of this project is to develop a comprehensive and compelling framework that leverages data mining approaches and policies composed by other community members to provide the user with appropriate information required when making policy decisions

column1: Exploring the Security Capabilities of Physical Layer Network Coding
column4: This project seeks to identify capabilities of the PNC technique to detect attacks and design corresponding mechanisms for different network infrastructures and attacker models

column1: Interactive Static Analysis for Early Detection of Software Vulnerabilities
column4: This research focuses on creating a mix-initiative developer-oriented paradigm for interacting with developers to aid in the detection and prevention of vulnerabilities
